channel.title: Saradomin potion not working

item.title: Saradomin potion not working
item.dc:creator: @beats beats
item.description:
@beats wrote:

Hey my saradomin potion heals tomuch hp is 239 it gets to 777 of 1 zip
614 (dementhium
this drinking.java

case SARADOMIN_BREW: ActionSender.sendChatMessage(player, 0, "You drink some of the foul liquid."); for(int i = 0; i < drink.getSkills().length; i++) { int skill = drink.getSkill(i); if(skill == Skills.HITPOINTS) { int hitpointsModification = (int) (player.getSkills().getMaxHitpoints() * 0.15); player.getSkills().heal(player.getSkills().getHitPoints() + hitpointsModification, player.getSkills().getMaxHitpoints() + hitpointsModification); } else if(skill == Skills.DEFENCE) { int defenceModification = (int) (player.getSkills().getLevelForXp(Skills.DEFENCE) * 0.25); player.getSkills().increaseLevelToMaximumModification(skill, defenceModification); } else { int modification = (int) (player.getSkills().getLevelForXp(skill) * 0.10); player.getSkills().decreaseLevelOnce(skill, modification); } }
